entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Alma
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:03 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 21 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
